content:
The AEGIS WildFHIR v3.0.0 test server and client have been updated to v3.0.1 with support for FHIR v3.0.1. The new urls are:

  • Client - http://wildfhir.aegis.net/fhir3-0-1-gui
  • Server - http://wildfhir.aegis.net/fhir3-0-1
Um, why would you put the "-1" in your URIs? fhir3-0-1 and fhir3-0-1 are identical from an implementation perspective (and if there's a fhir3-0-2, that would talk to the same endpoint.
